name: Kuhu
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Wishing you a many many BLAH BLAH BLAH...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to my dearest ANIMAL in my Zoo!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it ?
replayText: Otherwise , I'll see you when we meet  :^)
